headline: Nvidia, Qualcomm, and More Could Gain From Growing Autonomous Vehicle Market, BofA Says
summary: Nvidia, Qualcomm, and Caterpillar are some of the stocks Bank of America analysts said could benefit from a growing autonomous vehicle market, along with robotaxi makers.

headline: Heard on the Street Tuesday Recap: Squeaking By
summary: President Trump's “big, beautiful” tax bill passed the Senate on a 51-50 vote after Vice President JD Vance cast the tiebreaker.  The Dow rose nearly 1% by the close, driven by strong gains by Caterpillar, Home Depot and Sherwin-Williams.  The trillion-dollar club also lost a member, as Tesla shares sunk more than 5% after another online feud flared up between Trump and Elon Musk.
